EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_PCFW-Chicago_Q416.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Confirmed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://pivotal.io/event/cloud-native-workshop/chicago]]> Thank you for registering for the upcoming Cloud Native Workshop in Chicago. Please see event details below:
Date: Tuesday, November 1, 2016 Time: 8:30 AM - 11:30 AM Location: Pivotal Chicago, 222 W Merchandise Mart Plaza, Suite 1305, Chicago, IL 60654
{{my.Save the Date}}
If you have any further questions, please contact Andy Khorshid at akhorshid@pivotal.io <[[mailto:akhorshid@pivotal.io]]>.
